text: I’m awake! #HeartSurgery recovery has been better than expected. I’m sure my incision is healing because IT ITCHES!!!! Blarg!
name: Debra Wampler

text: Blarg not doing my best... I hope I can get a little happy boost here soon!
name: Salty Sally

text: In contrast to my last tweet, it's 2am and I want to go to sleep now and I'm not tired. Blarg.
name: Zoe Weinstein

text: @jeffcannata @BenKuchera Eh. 1/5. The multiplayer parts can be amazing. The rest? Blarg.

text: @Michelle_Pinsky @gardeniasnjazz Blarg this Stanley Cup Final sucks. It’s pretty much ‘who do you hate less?'

text: @Phase_Duskclaw @ZethXM Blarg! *gets encased in the goopy hug flailing as gets covered by it*
